These reading materials may be helpful to clarify exercises or for background. Note that these are all textbooks except for the paper by Ricard which is a comprehensive review of mantle convection theory which covers many derivations and scaling arguments.

 - [@davies.Dynamic.2009] - Dynamic Earth, Cambridge University Press
 - [@fowler.Solid.2004] - The solid earth : an introduction to global geophysics, Cambridge University Press
 - [@gubbins.Seismology.1990] - Seismology and plate tectonics, Cambridge University Press (QE534.2.G83 1990)
 - [@poirier.Introduction.2000] - Introduction to the Physics of the Earth's Interior, Cambridge University Press
 - [@ricardPhysicsMantleConvection2015] - Physics of Mantle Convection. In Treatise on Geophysics (pp. 23â€“71). Elsevier.

 - [@stacey.Physics.2008] - Physics of the Earth, 3rd Edn., Brookfield Press
